title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5.3 - Executive Order No. 3: Continuation and Review of Prior Executive Orders. [DAGGER]
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5.3 - Executive Order No. 3: Continuation and Review of Prior Executive Orders. [DAGGER]
State Regulations
WHEREAS, it is necessary to have an orderly transition and
administration of State government; NOW, THEREFORE, I, George E. Pataki, Governor of the State
of New York, by virtue of the authority vested in me by the Constitution and

Laws of the State of New York, do hereby designate the Counsel to the Governor, in conjunction with the Secretary to the Governor, the Director of the Division
of the Budget and the Director of State Operations, to review and evaluate all

Executive Orders and amendments thereto heretofore issued and promulgated and
in effect as of this date. The review process shall be conducted within the
next 90 days. Every State department, agency, division, board, bureau, commission and other entity over which I have executive power shall provide
assistance and cooperate as necessary for the accomplishment of the purposes of
this Executive Order. All Executive Orders and amendments thereto heretofore
issued and promulgated and in effect as of this date shall remain in full force
and effect until otherwise revoked, continued or modified. No boards, committees, offices, task groups or similar
entities existing pursuant to Executive Order shall enter into any financial or
contractual obligations until the review directed by this Executive Order is
complete and final determinations are made as to the continuation, modification
or revocation of the Executive Orders reviewed, provided, however, any
financial or contractual obligations which are necessary to protect the public
health, safety or welfare may be exempted from this paragraph pursuant to the
approval of the Counsel to the Governor. Signed: George E. Pataki

Dated: January 5, 1995

Footnotes

[Revoked by Executive

Order No. 5 (Eliot Spitzer), infra. ] [Revoked by Executive

Order No. 9 (David A. Paterson), infra. ] [Revoked by Executive

Order No. 2 (Andrew M. Cuomo), infra. ]

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
